item.name: sausage croissant
item.description: When Jack put sausage, a freshly cracked egg and American cheese on a buttery croissant, it earned the coveted title: “the sausage, freshly cracked egg and American cheese buttery croissant.” But that wouldn’t fit on the menu. Or anywhere. Hence, the shorthand.

item.name: GRANDE SAUSAGE BREAKFAST BURRITO
item.description: Your mouth better do some push-ups. Because this is a whole lot of burrito with sausage, scrambled eggs, hash browns, bacon crumbles, and shredded pepper jack cheese. Plus, cheddar cheese sauce and creamy Sriracha sauce. And it’s all wrapped in a warm flour tortilla—with a side of fire roasted salsa. Phew. That was a workout just saying all of that.
